p: Two widely used functions in F models are the growing degree-day function (GDD) according Murray et al. ( 1989) and the sigmoid function of mean temperature (SF), as described by Hänninen ( 1990) and Kramer ( 1994). Fila et al. ( 2014) obtained good results with phenology models when calculating forcing with the beta-type function (Yan and Hunt 1999; Amaducci et al. 2008) (see “ Supplementary Material”).
